attributes.action: Re-introduce partial terracing in football grounds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the Taylor report safety has undoubtedly been increased, but the draconian nature of the enforcement of 'all seater stadiums', rather than partial seating in areas such as family enclosures is to the detriment of the sport. There is evidence to suggest stadiums could retain the safety aspect, and keep an atmosphere, with a mix of both.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
